snippet: Brazil have been blamed for not being attacking enough since the World Cup started but it was their once admired defence that will carry the can for Tuesday's incredible 7-1 loss to Germany....

headline.print_headline: Brazil's Defence Goes Missing in Embarrassing Defeat
headline.main: Brazil's Defence Goes Missing in Embarrassing Defeat

lead_paragraph: Brazil have been blamed for not being attacking enough since the World Cup started but it was their once admired defence that will carry the can for Tuesday's incredible 7-1 loss to Germany.
